name: NYC STRETCH DOLL FIGHT!
description:
Submission for the Geopipe gamejam. 

This game is made by Cathy Zhang and Teresa Bing.

----------------------------------

WASD for movement

Space for Jump

LMB to shoot, RMB to teleport

The Floating Ball is for refill

The light beacon is for teleport.

----------------------------------

It is originally planned to be a multiplayer game, the feature is yet in development and will be posted sometime after. At this moment, the game is purely single-player.

We created a neon-themed new york city with ragdoll humans. We want to give you the fun of exploring the neighborhood of Rockefeller Center and shooting paintballs at colorful stretch dolls. 

This game is meant for casual playing, inspired by Human Fall Flat. We hope that you will enjoy the game! If you have any feedback, including bugs you encountered, please tell us and we will fix them as long as we can :)

---------------------------------

Sidenote: apologies for any bug you might encounter, we only got less than one week to work on this.
